# Schema: `CreateModelRequest`

Request payload for creating a new transformation model.

- Type: `object`
- Required fields: `name`, `project_name`, `sql`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `config` | `ModelConfig` | `false` | Configuration options for a transformation model. |
| `contract` | `ModelContract` | `false` | Output contract enforced for a model. |
| `description` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `freshness_policy` | `FreshnessPolicy` | `false` | Freshness policy for a model. |
| `materialization` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `name` | `string` | `true` | - |
| `project_name` | `string` | `true` | - |
| `sql` | `string` | `true` | - |
| `tags` | `array[string]` | `false` | - |
